content.question: Eadem nocte accidit ut esset luna plena, qui dies maritimos aestus maximos in Oceano efficere consuevit, nostrisque id erat incognitum. Ita uno tempore et longas naves, quibus Caesar exercitum transportandum curaverat quasque in aridum subduxerat, aestus complebat, et onerarias quae ad ancoras erant deligatae, tempestas adflictabat, neque ulla nostris facultas aut administrandi aut auxiliandi dabatur. Bellum Gallicum 4.29 Answer the following questions in English unless the question specifically asks you to write out Latin words. Number your answer to each question. 1. What kind of clause is introduced by ut (line 1) ? 2. To what natural phenomenon does id (line 2) refer? 3. What Latin noun is the direct object of complebat (line 4) ? 4. What was the main purpose of an oneraria (line 4) ? 5. What is the grammatical function of nostris (line 5) ? 6. (A) Translate in context auxiliandi (line 6) and (B) identify its form.

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
